Pret au secteur routier - Cote d'Ivoire

abstracts.cdata!:
The First Highway Sector Loan Project
            will assist the Government in its policy of restrained
            investments, improved sector planning and coordination and
            improved road maintenance operations, by financing part of
            the 1981-83 highway investment program and relevant
            technical assistance and training. Project benefits would
            accrue to the economy at large in the form of savings in
            vehicle operating costs; institutional strengthening would
            also be a major benefit. The project does not face special risks.
